Verses: 1 aanapadiyinaale, Avarudaiya Ilaippaarudhalil Piravesippadharkedhuvaana Vaakkuththaththam Namakkundaayirukka, Ungalil Oruvanum Adhai Adaiyaamal Pinvaangipponavanaaga Kaanappadaadhapadikku Bayandhirukkakkadavom.
2 enenil, Suvisesham Avargalukku Arivikkappattadhupola Namakkum Arivikkappattadhu; Kettavargal Visuvaasamillaamal Kettapadiyinaal, Avargal Ketta Vasanam Avargalukkup Pirayojanappadavillai.

3 visuvaasiththavargalaagiya Naamo Andha Ilaippaarudhalil Piravesikkirom; Avarudaiya Kiriyaigal Ulagaththotramudhal Mudindhirundhum Ivargal Ennudaiya Ilaippaarudhalil Piravesippadhillaiyendru Ennudaiya Kobaththile Aanaiyitten Endraar
4 melum, Dhevan Thammudaiya Kiriyaigalaiyellaam Mudiththu Ezhaam Naalile Oindhirundhaar Endru Ezhaam Naalaikkuriththu Oridaththil Solliyirukkiraar.
5 andriyum, Avargal Ennudaiya Ilaippaarudhalil Piravesippadhillai Endrum Andha Idaththiledhaane Solliyirukkiraar.
6 aagaiyaal, Silar Adhil Piravesippadhu Innum Varappogira Kaariyamaayirukkirapadiyinaalum, Suviseshaththai Mudhalaavadhu Kettavargal Keezhppadiyaamaiyinaale Adhil Piravesiyaamar Ponapadiyinaalum,

7 indru Avarudaiya Saththaththai Ketpeergalaagil Ungal Irudhayangalai Kadinappaduththaadhirungal Endru Vegukaalaththirkuppinbu Thaaveedhin Sangeedhaththile Solliyirukkirapadi, Indru Endru Solvadhinaale Pinnum Orunaalai Kuriththirukkiraar.
8 yosuvaa Avargalai Ilaippaarudhalukkutpaduththiyirundhaal, Pinbu Avar Veroru Naalaikkuriththu Solliyirukkamaattaare.
9 aagaiyaal, Dhevanudaiya Janangalukku Ilaippaarugira Kaalam Inivarugiradhaayirukkiradhu.
10 enenil, Avarudaiya Ilaippaarudhalil Piravesiththavan, Dhevan Thammudaiya Kiriyaigalai Mudiththu Oindhadhupola, Thaanum Than Kiriyaigalai Mudiththu Oindhiruppaan.
11 aagaiyaal, Andhath Thirushtaandhaththinpadi, Oruvanaagilum Keezhppadiyaamaiyinaale Vizhundhupogaadhapadikku, Naam Indha Ilaippaarudhalil Piravesikka Jaakkiradhaiyaayirukkakkadavom.

12 dhevanudaiya Vaarththaiyaanadhu Jeevanum Vallamaiyum Ulladhaayum, Irupuramum Karukkulla Endhap Pattayaththilum Karukkaanadhaayum, Aaththumaavaiyum Aaviyaiyum, Kanukkalaiyum Oonaiyum Pirikkaththakkadhaaga Uruvak Kuththugiradhaayum, Irudhayaththin Ninaivugalaiyum Yosanaigalaiyum Vagaiyarukkiradhaayum Irukkiradhu.
13 avarudaiya Paarvaikku Maraivaana Sirushti Ondrumillai; Sagalamum Avarudaiya Kangalukku Munbaaga Nirvaanamaayum Veliyarangamaayumirukkiradhu, Avarukke Naam Kanakku Oppuvikkavendum.
14 vaanangalin Vazhiyaaip Paralogaththirkuppona Dhevakumaaranaagiya Yesu Ennum Magaa Piradhaana Aasaariyar Namakku Irukkirapadiyinaal, Naam Pannina Arikkaiyai Urudhiyaaip Patrikkondirukkakkadavom.

15 nammudaiya Balaveenangalaikkuriththup Paridhabikkakkoodaadha Piradhaana Aasaariyar Namakkiraamal, Ellaavidhaththilum Nammaippol Sodhikkappattum, Paavamillaadhavaraayirukkira Piradhaana Aasaariyare Namakkirukkiraar.
16 aadhalaal, Naam Irakkaththaip Peravum, Etra Samayaththil Sagaayanjseyyunkirubaiyai Adaiyavum, Dhairiyamaai Kirubaasanaththandaiyile Serakkadavom.
